thread.section_title: Blinds on the Net Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds on the Net | blindsonthenet.com.au
thread.title: Gillian
thread.title_full: Blinds on the Net reviewed by Gillian

author: Gillian
title: Gillian
text: Blinds on the Net were the only company that could produce my roller blind quickly. I didn't receive it in the 5 days priority order that I was hoping for (and paid for) but they did follow up with the courier service and located where it was so I think it took 7 days to receive. The blind is the perfect fit and does the job required. Happy and very good service (not quite excellent). Thanks
